title: Ticket #4503: Concurrency allowing too many jobs , one sched
description: I am pretty positive this is a bug. For static slots with concurrency limits greater then 1 and if you start those jobs from a single submit file, you will periodically get 1 extra job running. I am unsure if you have N more jobs then the concurrency limit allows if more then one extra jobs starts to run. If one submits the jobs slowly, the concurrency limits are correct.
creator: bt
